mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TB.BRDNO DESC) AS RNUM , BRDNO, BRDTITLE, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BRDDATE , TB.USERNO, USERNM BRDWRITER, BGNAME, TB.BGNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBG.BGDELETEFLAG='N' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 15

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TB.BRDDATE DESC) AS RNUM , TB.BRDNO, SUBSTR(TB.BRDTITLE, 0, 10) REMEMO, USERNM REWRITER, PHOTO , TO_CHAR(REDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REDATE FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 20

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRDNO DESC) AS RNUM , BRDNO, BRDTITLE, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BRDDATE, BRDNOTICE , TB.USERNO, USERNM BRDWRITER FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNOTICE='Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 5
